title: Where are the 3 PlayStation Rumors, GREG?! - KFGD 03.31.22
description:
Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

GamesBeat's Jeff Grubb comes to KFGD to talk about where those three PlayStation rumors went, Greg runs Tim through wtf is wrong with Marvel's Avengers, and Tim gets mad at the news and walks off.
